name: Twin Peaks VR
description:
Twin Peaks VR is a virtual reality Twin Peaks video game developed by Collider Games in collaboration with Showtime and David Lynch. The game was announced in October 2018, with a special preview at the 2018 Festival of Disruption from October 13–14.

It was released on December 13, 2019 on Steam, for use with the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
